mapper.select: SELECT stock_evaluate.stockid ,stock_evaluate.industryid ,stock_evaluate.weight ,stock_evaluate.score ,stock_evaluate.pb_index ,stock_evaluate.deviation_index , stock_evaluate.pe_index , stock_evaluate.committee_INDEX , stock_evaluate.volume_index , stock_evaluate.rank , sw_stock_info.name FROM stock_evaluate ,sw_stock_info WHERE (stock_evaluate.industryid = #{0,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) AND (stock_evaluate.stockid = sw_stock_info.stockid) ORDER BY `rank` ASC
SELECT * FROM sw_industry ORDER BY `rank` ASC

SELECT stock_2016.stockid, stock_2016.turnover, sw_stock_info.name FROM stock_2016 ,sw_stock_info WHERE (stock_2016.stockid = sw_stock_info.stockid) AND (sw_stock_info.industryid = #{0,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) AND(stock_2016.date =(SELECT MAX(stock_2016.date)FROM stock_2016 )) ORDER BY stock_2016.turnover DESC limit 0,10
